scripts.build-gateway: docker build -f Docker/gateway.Dockerfile -t gateway . && docker tag gateway jordancarlson/gateway && docker push jordancarlson/gateway
scripts.build-websocket: docker build -f Docker/websocket.Dockerfile -t websocket . && docker tag websocket jordancarlson/websocket && docker push jordancarlson/websocket
scripts.build-messenger: docker build -f Docker/messenger.Dockerfile -t messenger . && docker tag messenger jordancarlson/messenger && docker push jordancarlson/messenger
scripts.build-frontend: docker build -t frontend . && docker tag frontend jordancarlson/frontend && docker push jordancarlson/frontend
scripts.build-users: docker build -f Docker/users.Dockerfile -t users . && docker tag users jordancarlson/users && docker push jordancarlson/users
scripts.build-all-docker: npm run build-gateway && npm run build-websocket && npm run build-messenger && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-users
scripts.deploy: docker swarm init && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml pull && docker stack deploy -c docker-compose.yml final-app
